question: Which country has notified the United Nations about its withdrawal from the World Health Organisation (WHO)?
explanation:
The United States has formally notified the United Nations about its withdrawal from the World Health Organisation (WHO).
The withdrawal notice was sent to UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres and it will take effect in a year, on July 6, 2021. The US is the largest donor of WHO and provides more than USD 400 million per year. It currently owes the WHO around USD 200 million in current and past dues.
